sequence:
A Date With Atago

<size=45>Chapter 7: Advance Bravely!</size>
Back then, if our flagship was still there, unflagging and decisive...
Even if the path would have been fraught with sacrifices,
I would have continued to advance bravely until the final moment, never looking back.

scripts.say: The thing that I want most is you, Commander.
Even though I understand that I will never be able to make you mine, as much as I'd like to.
But this is your big sister's personality, as you should know by now.
My vision went dark, and then I felt a warm, soft sensation press against me.
Mmh, I didn't say it had to be today.
As long as you promise to answer my feelings one day, even if it's at the very end... when my battle ends.
For that moment, I can do anything, and wait as long as it takes.
For you to belong to me, Commander... I can continue fighting, and overcome any obstacle.
At that moment, it became clear to me. This was not craze or obsession. For Atago, this was her raison d'etre, the thing that gave her the will to survive another day, nothing more.
So, let me say it again...
Hey, Commander, become mine, and mine alone. Just listen to me, you won't have to think about anything else...
Because this time, I'm definitely not letting you go~â™ª
